content: ## overlay mosaic crochet pattern ## compatible with zigzcrochet s mosaic bookcase 1 note that this is a 2d motif not a 3d bookend ## pattern includes ## * left facing horse bookend chart * right facing horse bookend chart * left handed and right handed written instructions for both charts * english * us terminology ## the following stitches and techniques are used ## * chain * single_crochet * double_crochet * angled double_crochet to the left and to the right * double_crochet 2 together * working in the front loop only * working in the back loop only ## size material and gauge ## the sample in the photo was made using 30g drops cotton merino dark green and off white and a 4mm crochet hook it measures 19x14cm gauge 10x10cm = 22sts x 22 row 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mosaic-bookcase-extended
